icon.description: Customize the icons of the options

label.description: The display text for the option

typeDetail.IOption:
interface IOption {
  value?: string | number
  label?: string
  disabled?: boolean
  icon?: Component
  required?:boolean
}
typeDetail.ICacheOp:
interface ICacheItem {
  frequency: number
  key: string
  time: number
}

interface ICacheOp {
  key: string // 本地缓存的唯一 key 值
  sortBy?: 'frequency' | 'time' // 排序的字段，默认 frequency (频次)
  sort?: 'desc' | 'asc' // 排序方式，默认 desc (降序)
  dataKey?: string // 数据中的唯一标识的 key 名称,默认 value
  highlightClass?: string // 个性化高亮 class 名称，默认：memorize-highlight
  highlightNum?: number // 高亮个性化的条数,默认：Infinity
  cacheNum?: number // 存储个性化的条数,默认：Infinity
  serialize?: ()=> string  // 本地存储序列化方法,默认：JSON.stringify
  deserialize?: ()=> ICacheItem[] // 本地存储序反列化方法，默认：JSON.parse
}

events.name: blur
events.description: Listen for an out-of-focus event in the input box
events.description_zh: 监听输入框失去焦点事件

events.name: change
events.description: Listen for binding value change events

events.name: focus
events.description: Listen to the input box to get the focus event
events.description_zh: 监听输入框获取焦点事件

events.name: remove-tag
events.description: Listen for the removal of tags when multi-selection
events.description_zh: 监听多选时移除标签事件

events.name: top-create-click
events.description: Listen for a new button click event at the top, which is used with the top-create property
events.description_zh: 监听顶部新增按钮点击事件，同 top-create 属性一起使用

events.name: visible-change
events.description: Listen to the display and hiding status of the drop-down pop-up box
events.description_zh: 监听下拉弹框的显示隐藏状态

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Makes the input box lose focus

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Makes the input box get focus

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Pull down the slot at the bottom of the pop-up box
